Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 16th overall pick, by Arizona in 2007...
Traded from Arizona to Tampa Bay on 1/31/2011 (Going to TB: SS B. Fernandez, CF V. Machado, 1B A. Rizzo, C J. Realmuto, CF T. Wheeler. Going to ARI: P R. Nolasco, P J. Hirsch, P D. Hudson)...
Injured on 7/12/2013 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/5/2016, off Lawrence Butler (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/2017, off Mark Melancon (OAK)...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 2020...
Drove in 6 runs against Kansas City on 6/30/2021...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2023, hitting .347 with 9 HR, 23 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Chicago (A) on 7/8/2023...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Florida on 2/4/2024 to a 3-year deal worth $7,212,365 per year...
